About Jake Freudinger

Digital Consultant for Creators & Small Businesses

My Approach: Practical Guidance, Real Results

Hey, I'm Jake. Through Froydinger Media, I partner with content creators and small businesses to cut through the noise and build effective digital strategies. Whether it's YouTube, podcasts, blogging, or establishing a solid online presence, my focus is on practical, actionable advice.

Forget the 'guru' hype. I draw on real-world experience, including work with channels and podcasts reaching over 200 million views and projects like the Win The Night podcast. I've seen what works and, just as importantly, what doesn't.

Core Focus Areas:

  • üéØ Content Strategy: Developing clear plans for video, audio, and written content that resonates with your audience.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è Content Systems: Building efficient workflows for planning, creation, and distribution to save you time and effort.
  • üìà Audience Growth: Implementing sustainable tactics to get your work discovered and build an engaged community.
  • üõ†Ô∏è Digital Presence: Crafting clean, effective websites and integrating your platforms for a cohesive brand experience.

My goal isn't to do the work for you, but to empower you with the clarity, tools, and strategies needed to succeed independently. I leverage insights from diverse projects and help you implement both traditional and AI-driven workflows.

While I can help integrate AI tools effectively, I fully respect any creator's or business's decision to avoid AI for ethical, creative, or personal reasons. Your preferences always come first.

If you're feeling stuck or overwhelmed by the digital landscape, let's chat. We can figure out what's holding you back and build a straightforward plan to move forward.
